rules_text: When Feisty Cub dies, you may search your library for a Beast card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
notes:
New card — Replaced Beastly Opportunity

While I appreciate the callback to Giant Opportunity, green already has Lots of Things at uncommon to create Beast tokens, which makes Beastly Opportunity rather similar. As such, I want to downshift it and repurpose it into a more versatile card.
